mapper.sql: id ,name ,description updated_time as updatedTime, created_time as createdTime
mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, a.description, c.begin_time as beginTime, c.end_time as endTime, a.updated_time as updatedTime, a.created_time as createdTime from class_arrange arra left join arrange a on arra.arrange_id = a.id left join class c on arra.class_id = c.id where arra.class_id = #{classId}
